video.title: Z Nation
video.synopsis: A team embarks on a perilous cross-country mission to transport the one man who survived a deadly zombie virus, hoping he holds the key to a vaccine.

episodes.synopsis: A team of everyday heroes transports the only known survivor of a zombie virus from New York to California in hopes of using his blood for a vaccine.
episodes.title: Puppies and Kittens

episodes.synopsis: In need of gas, the team follows a suspicious stranger to a damaged oil refinery deep inside a New Jersey zone packed with zombies.
episodes.title: Fracking Zombies

episodes.synopsis: Out for revenge on Cassandra, her dangerous "family" of cannibals catches up with the team and kidnaps Addy, endangering the mission.
episodes.title: Philly Feast

episodes.synopsis: Citizen Z directs the team to a helicopter controlled by a mysterious general living atop a heavily guarded skyscraper where zombies roam freely.
episodes.title: Full Metal Zombie

episodes.synopsis: A tornado forces the team to Warren's hometown, where she searches for her husband, whom she lost in the early days of the apocalypse.
episodes.title: Home Sweet Zombie

episodes.synopsis: After taking refuge in a safe enclave where no weapons are allowed, the team battles for control of the compound against a zombie-worshipping cult.
episodes.title: Resurrection Z

episodes.synopsis: Lost and out of water in rural Kansas, the team is on the verge of breaking up when they arrive at a crazy gun show and Wild West bar.
episodes.title: Welcome to the Fu-Bar

episodes.synopsis: When the last surviving cosmonaut from the International Space Station crashes to Earth, Citizen Z gets a new friend, who may have a secret agenda.
episodes.title: Zunami

episodes.synopsis: Mack and Addy become trapped by a zombie they just can't kill. A series of escalating fights with the zombie forces them to confront an ugly truth.
episodes.title: Die Zombie Die... Again

episodes.synopsis: While in South Dakota, an imminent meltdown forces the team to help the locals repair a nearby nuclear power plant full of radiated zombies.
episodes.title: Going Nuclear

episodes.synopsis: In need of shelter and medical supplies, the team seeks refuge in an all-female compound where men are not allowed.
episodes.title: Sisters of Mercy

episodes.synopsis: Three strangers earn their way on the team, taking a keen interest in Murphy, which eventually takes a deadly turn.
episodes.title: Murphy's Law

episodes.synopsis: The team is rerouted to a lab located in an abandoned missile silo, where they search for the developer of the experimental vaccine given to Murphy.
episodes.title: Doctor of the Dead

episodes.synopsis: Moments after the nuclear weapons launch, the group splits up to outrun the blast and Citizen Z offers a bounty for Murphy and his vaccine-rich blood.
episodes.title: The Murphy

episodes.synopsis: The bounty placed on Murphy's head by Citizen Z is irresistible to everyone. The team is reunited but now must fight both zombies and bounty hunters.
episodes.title: White Light

episodes.synopsis: After hitching a ride with a caravan of nuclear blast survivors, the group is attacked by a new strain of superfast zombies.
episodes.title: Zombie Road

episodes.synopsis: Murphy and Cassandra reach a greenhouse growing Batch 47, rumored to be a natural cure for the zombie virus, but it's guarded by fearsome hybrids.
episodes.title: Batch 47

episodes.synopsis: A face from the past returns with a big surprise for Murphy. Meanwhile, the group faces a new deadly threat at a Mennonite farm.
episodes.title: Zombaby!

episodes.synopsis: Murphy is bewitched by his baby daughter, but the team worries there's more to her than meets the eye. Vasquez sneaks away for a secret meeting.
episodes.title: Zombie Baby Daddy

episodes.synopsis: After an accident splits up the group, 10K finds himself in the company of two shady characters who put his life in danger.
episodes.title: Down the Mississippi

episodes.synopsis: As the team searches frantically for Murphy, he falls into a trap set by an overzealous zombie fan and engages in a battle of wits with his captor.
episodes.title: The Collector

episodes.synopsis: Strange lights and a mysterious woman lead the team on an adventure through an abandoned New Mexico Air Force base in search of zombie aliens.
episodes.title: RoZwell

episodes.synopsis: When a horde of zombies drives them onto sacred Native American land, the group finds two halves of a tribe using different strategies to survive.
episodes.title: We Were Nowhere Near the Grand Canyon

episodes.synopsis: Taking shelter at a hotel run by white-collar survivors, the group gets mired in corporate politics -- until gunfire shakes up the agenda.
episodes.title: Corporate Retreat

episodes.synopsis: The Queen of the Zeros issues an invitation to the team as Dr. Kurian prepares to test his new vaccine and Vasquez decides his moment has come.
episodes.title: Party With the Zeros

episodes.synopsis: Chaos erupts when Dr. Kurian's vaccine has unintended effects. Murphy uses his powers of mental manipulation to alter the chain of command.
episodes.title: Adios Muchachos

episodes.synopsis: As they finally cross the border into California, the members of the team reflect on how far they've come since the zombie apocalypse began.
episodes.title: Day One

episodes.synopsis: A journey through the abandoned streets of LA leads the team toward a mobile CDC lab, but the Zeros are hot on their heels.
episodes.title: End Times
